patterns: when libary open closed opening hours study spaces hallward green djanogly
response:
All UoN libaries will be open 24 hours till 31st Jan 2023. Outside exams period, check here for further info:
 https://www.nottingham.ac.uk/library/using/libraries/index.aspx

patterns: catch hopper 903 stop time timings hours frequently days jubilee main campus
response:
Hopper buses run Mon-Fri every 15 mins.
Every 30 mins on Saturday.
Do NOT run on Sundays. 
Stops at Jubilee at Exchange Bldg. 
DRSV, Portland Bldg and other places in Main Campus. More info on app.

patterns: nearest tram tramstop
response:
If you are in main campus, just behind Trent is the UoN Tram Stop.
If in Jubilee, your nearest one is QMC.
